definition: cheerleading squad/also written 啦啦隊|啦啦队
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: Those cheerleaders at college are now hot property.
sentences.chinese: 那些大学里的拉拉队长现在可是香饽饽。

sentences.english: I got a lot of that back home. My parents are big cheerleaders.
sentences.chinese: 你确定她真的是我们的拉拉队员？

sentences.english: You were cheerleading captain at Ridgefield?
sentences.chinese: 你就是里奇菲尔德的拉拉队队长？

sentences.english: The cheerleaders bustled about excitingly before their performance.
sentences.chinese: 拉拉队长们在演出前兴奋地奔忙着。

sentences.english: My girl friend is a cheer leader.
What if Chinese fans serenade rival teams with the guttural, unprintable "Beijing curse"?
sentences.chinese: 如果中国球迷的拉拉队发出低俗的“京骂”将会怎样？

sentences.english: Romi is one of the 34 members of the Denver Broncos cheerleader team.
sentences.chinese: 露美是丹佛野马拉拉队的34名成员之一。

sentences.english: Most are former state employees drafted out of retirement.
sentences.chinese: 这些拉拉队员大多数是退休的国家工作人员。

sentences.english: Even by the standards of hooray analyst coverage, this was  extreme.
sentences.chinese: 即使是对比拉拉队分析师的分析，这也太过了。

sentences.english: My daughter thinks she can be a cheerleader her whole life.
sentences.chinese: 我女儿以为她一辈子都会当拉拉队员。

sentences.english: I went to see the cheerleaders.
My gril friend is a cheer leader.
Robert goes to where the cheerleaders are practicing and talks to Michelle again.
sentences.chinese: 罗勃特来到拉拉队训练的地方，又和米舍聊了起来。

sentences.english: I drew a cartoon of a cheerleader on my paper.
sentences.chinese: 我在纸上画了一幅拉拉队领队的漫画。

sentences.english: Filling sound come and go, this is our class cheerleader voice.
sentences.chinese: 加油声此起彼伏，这是我们班的拉拉队发出的声音。

sentences.english: Awards will also be given to the teams with the best cheering sections.
sentences.chinese: 并且人们还会给最佳的拉拉队颁发奖品。

definition: to cheer for/to encourage/to boost the morale of
to be a dancing partner to sb/to perform as a backup dancer/taxi dancer (hired dancing partner)/escort
